label: WattRamp
description: FTP testing. Three test protocols (Ramp, 20-min, 2x8-min), 9 data fields, real-time target power and zone guidance, extended analytics (NP, VI, EF), 7-zone power calculation, test history with charts, audio alerts, 10 languages. Works offline, no subscriptions.
releaseNotes: v1.5.6: Fix FTP calculation coefficients, data field consistency, max 1-min power accuracy, alert sounds. Contact info@wattramp.com to troubleshoot any issues.
